trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class exposes a public <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp> event.
You can use the properties of the QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs class to return custom help for a particular control to an accessible client, such as a screen reader.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar as propriedades da classe QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs retornar ajuda personalizada para um controle específico para um cliente acessível, como leitores de tela.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp> event, you must set the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpNamespace%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpString%2A> properties to appropriate values.
trans-unit.target: Quando você processa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp>evento, você deve definir os valores a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpNamespace%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpString%2A>propriedades com valores apropriados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A> property should be a string representation of a numeric Help topic ID.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>propriedade deve ser uma representação de cadeia de caracteres de um tópico da Ajuda numérico ID.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The file containing Help for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O arquivo que contém a Ajuda para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The string defining what Help to get for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que define o que ajuda a obter o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The keyword to associate with the Help request for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-chave a ser associado com a solicitação de ajuda para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Help keyword for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a palavra-chave de ajuda para o controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Help topic associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that was queried.
trans-unit.target: O tópico de ajuda associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> que foi consultado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the name of the Help file.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica o nome do arquivo de Ajuda.

trans-unit.source: The name of the Help file.
trans-unit.target: O nome do arquivo de Ajuda.

trans-unit.source: This name can be in the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm.
trans-unit.target: Esse nome pode estar no formato C:\path\sample.chm ou /folder/file.htm.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string defining what Help to get for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cadeia de caracteres que define o que ajuda a obter o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Help to retrieve for the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: A Ajuda para recuperar o objeto acessível.
